name: Bombs - An explosive game for your brain - Free version
name_original: Bombs - An explosive game for your brain - Free version
description:
The new no. 1 top app from the USA!
We have styled the classics into brand new top apps!
Old Games - Brand New!

The mines should not explode. The numbers will help you. A new Minesweeper for your device. Try to find all mines and beat your highscore. Various difficulty levels will help in the beginning. The numbers indicate the note where a mine is hidden. A great Minesweeper clone.
Yes, it is Free!
